participant_1.name: Mike
participant_1.personality: friendly and approachable, enjoys sharing experiences and has a strong sense of responsibility.
participant_1.background: i am a male. i own a house in florida. i've a children and a dogs. i enjoy american sports. i work in it and have been at the same company for 15 years.

participant_2.name: Alex
participant_2.personality: disciplined and determined, values teamwork and is passionate about serving others.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.
